backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, product CRUD, Stripe configuration, and payment method option management with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old storage schema to include new Stripe fields and default payment method options.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new Stripe payment method UI and checkout behavior updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend files including new payment method option hooks and admin UI.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color tokens and light/dark theme variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for storefront, checkout, and admin pages and wraps the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, showing alerts or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Defines the main store layout with header, navigation, footer, and conditional admin/profile UI.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Renders a product card with image, details, and an add‑to‑cart button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, user profiles, roles, admin status, and Stripe-related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for merging class names and formatting prices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page linking to product management and Stripe payment settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides CRUD UI for products including add, edit, delete, and image upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStripeSetu: Admin interface for configuring Stripe keys, allowed countries, and payment method options.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, supports quantity updates, removal, and triggers checkout session creation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message with navigation options back to cart or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success message, checks Stripe session status, and clears the cart if completed.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info with quantity selection and allows adding the product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Lists all products with loading skeletons and supports adding items to the cart or viewing details.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand-based persistent cart store supporting add, remove, update, clear, and total calculations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended theming options, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state including Stripe‑related feature requests, existing features, and known issues about prior build failures.
